## SettingsDialogHelper class

Settings dialog helper. Extends DialogHelper with setting management capabilities.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SettingsDialogHelper extends DialogHelper 
```
**Extends:** [DialogHelper](./zotero-plugin-toolkit.dialoghelper.md)
